wikipedia_page.main: Michael Young (born 23 August 1966) is a British industrial designer based in Hong Kong. He works in the areas of product, furniture and interior design with studios in Hong Kong and Brussels.

response: * Michael Young (actor) (born 1952), host of Diaries of a Xenophobe and How to Make Love to an Immigrant

* Michael Young (Canadian politician) (1934–2010), Canadian mayor of Victoria, British Columbia

* Michael Young (basketball, born 1994), University of Pittsburgh and professional player
* Michael Young (baseball) (born 1976), Major League Baseball shortstop/third baseman
* Michael Young (industrial designer) (born 1966), in Hong Kong

In 2016, Coalesse's LessThanFive Chair was included in an exhibit at Grand Hornu in Belgium that showcased the work of designer Michael Young.
